verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
I love to live in Your house oh Lord
I love to sit here at Your feet
And let Your words be the food I eat
The food I eat

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I love to live in Your house oh Lord
To dine at the table with my King
And give to You the praise I bring
The praise I bring

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For here in Your house
I find Your embrace
You set on my head
A garland of grace

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
When I lift my hands
You fill me with more
I love to live
(sisters echo: I love to live)
In the house of the Lord
